text.0: indra and pūṣan will we call for friend ship and prosperity.
text.1: and for the winning of the spoil.
text.2: one by the soma sits to drink juice which the mortar hath expressed.
text.3: the other longs for curd and meal.
text.4: goats are the team that draws the one the other hath bay steeds at hand.
text.5: with both of these he slays the fiends.
text.6: when indra wondrous strong brought down the streams the mighty waterfloods.
text.7: pūṣan was standing by his side.
text.8: to this to pūṣans favouring love and indras may we closely cling.
text.9: as to a trees extended bough.
text.10: as one who drives a car draws in his reins may we draw pūṣan near.
text.11: and indra for our great success.
